description:
Gokudo manages to chance upon the sacred relic, but is more than a little intimidated when he discovers it`s guarded by a huge dragon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daisan no Otoko no Shoutai ni Oretacha Buttonda! no Koto
Se nos revela la identidad del tercer hombre.
The Shocking Truth of the Third Man!
第三の男の正体にオレたちゃブッとんだ! のこと
